description: This file defines a class NoteTable that encapsulates constants related to the 'notes' table in a local SQLite database. It includes table and column names, as well as SQL statements for creating the table and an index, indicating its role in database schema management.

classes.name: NoteTable
classes.description: A helper class that centralizes table and column name constants along with SQL statements for creating the 'notes' table and associated indexes in a local SQLite database.

methods.name: NoteTable._
methods.description: A private constructor to prevent instantiation of the class, enforcing usage of static members.
